name: Efficus: Kono Omoi wo Kimi ni...
overview: Efficus - Kono Omoi o Kimi ni... is a dating simulation by Genki that is based on a school social standing, such as who you hand around with and when. Its time is based by a monthly calendar and as the months go by you will be able to advance your social standing with different women, including 2 different teachers at your school. The game's plot is that the player controls a young high school student that is transfered to a new high school due to his parent's new job and he has to begin in his new school (beginning in september 30th) and meet new people, he can try be better appreaciated by the girls of his new school, depending of the player actions they can become his friends or maybe one of them will finally love him at the end of the game. During the game the player can walk around the town (when he is not at school) and visit restaurants, shops, cinemas, a theme park, aquarium, etc. And after that use them to go in his dates with the girls. For the town the game uses a third person perspective and for the conversations a first person one.
